Body: Is there a way to record phone calls? I tried some apps that appeared to work but it seems these only record thru the mic, ideally it should work with headset and earphones too but it doesn't and the sound quality is really poor and buggy. Is there a market leader for this purpose? I want to automatically record all calls and preferably automatically save them to Dropbox, Skydrive or Google Drive. I have Samsung Galaxy S. UpdateI tried all the phone recording apps and none work. UpdateWhy is something simple so difficult? I tried all the phone recording apps and none work. They don't even look good. This feature lacks support and it is important. We are many users who need to record phone calls. Why can't we?
Title: Record phone calls

history.Text: Do you know of a good app that can record phone calls? I tried some that appeared to work but it seems these only record thru the mike, ideally it should work with headsett and earphones too but it doesn't and the sound quality is really poor and buggy. Is there a market leader for this purpose? I want to automatically record all calls and preferably automatically save them to dropbox, skydrive or googledrive. I have Sumsung Galaxy S1.
